description: A delicious slice that is moreish and decadent but simple to make!
name: Chewy Caramel Nutty Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a slice tin - 17.5cm x 27cm. Preheat oven to 180 degrees celsius.
Mix together flour, caster sugar and melted butter.
Press flour mixture into the slice tin and bake for 10 minutes until lightly golden.
Remove tin from oven and scatter nuts, choc chips and coconut over the base. Pour condensed milk over all the other ingredients until covered.
Bake until golden and a little firm in the centre - it will set a little firmer when cold so don't cook it for too long! If you think it is browning too much, cover with foil.
Wait until cool before cutting. I cut it in the tin as it is a bit easier. Eat and enjoy!
